title: Too much flashing in Control Example
description: When running the control example and resizing the window vertically, all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash excessively.
OB: Tabs in the TabFolder and Frames flash excessively when resizing the window vertically in the control example.
EB: Tabs in the TabFolder and Frames should not flash excessively when resizing the window vertically in the control example.
SR: Investigate the cause of excessive flashing and fix it to ensure that the Tabs in the TabFolder and Frames do not flash excessively when resizing the window vertically in the control example.
